name: VS Neighbors FULL MOD
description:
As always, the Neighbors decided to annoy Edd, but this time Tord decided to joke with them too (so pay attention to the backgrounds*). This mod contains: - 4 new songs - Dialogues between songs - Cutscenes Credits

enragedartist - Lead Artist & Director NoIx_Music - Musician Sergierix - Programmer & Charter Foxkin - Cutscene Animator

Others

Original Sergierix icon by J.A Franklin J Gamer made the original event of moving notes

(https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dEExlw1sgtc) *Btw, Tord did not betray GF, the plan was of she pretending to be sad.
